Barcode reader device.
The barcode reader device is a single device representing exactly one logical module on a sias instrument.
\ingroup Dev_BCReader
The interface includes - a property for turning on and off the barcode reader; - methods for getting the raw or verified/translated barcodes; .
In Addition it has possibilities for barcode verification and filtering using regular expressions.

Barcode filter definition.
This filter can be used to check if the barcode is valid as well as to replace parts of the code. To do this, regular expressions are used. The replacement works using back references.
